column1: Management Economics and Consumer Studies MSc
column5: As of the study year 2022-2023 the master programme Management, Economics, and Consumer Studies is replaced by five independent programmes. Click on one of the five programmes below to get to know everything about the contents of the programme, admission requirements, student experiences, and future career options.Master's Consumer StudiesThis programme offers a unique and incomparable approach to study consumers in an ever changing society. Why do they behave the way they do? And how does this relate to society, where health and sustainability are seen as increasingly important? You obtain the knowledge and skills to analyze consumers making choices, acquiring, using and disposing products and services.
